data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who are far from you in Rajshahi. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rajshahi, Rajshahi, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 2,591,949 people in Rajshahi who are far from you. Please add 519 new house churches this year.
Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 2,584,163, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Rajshahi, Rajshahi, Bangladesh to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Brahmin Kanaujia people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Brahmin Kanaujia people.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Rajshahi, Rajshahi, Bangladesh today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Rajshahi, Rajshahi, Bangladesh to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.section_summary:
the county of Rajshahi, Rajshahi, Bangladesh has a population of 2,595,200.

We estimate Rajshahi has 3,251 people who might know Jesus, 7,786 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,584,163 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Rajshahi, Rajshahi, Bangladesh.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
